hero.subtitle: Millat Umidi is one of the biggest educational holdings in Uzbekistan. Our projects: Millat Umidi University, Millat Umidi School, Khan Academy, Edu Action Study Abroad, Edu Action Exams Center(IDP IELTS)

founder.name: Umidjon Ishmukhamedov
founder.title: Founder of Millat Umidi Group
founder.quote1: At Millat Umidi, we believe that education is the foundation of a prosperous society. Our journey began with a simple vision: to create world-class educational institutions that nurture young minds and prepare them for tomorrow's challenges.
founder.quote2: We are not just building schools and universities; we are building dreams, shaping futures, and creating opportunities for the next generation. Every member of our team plays a crucial role in this transformative mission.
founder.quote3: Join us in making a lasting impact on education in Uzbekistan and beyond. Together, we can build a brighter future for our nation's youth.

cta.ready_to_join: Ready to join these success stories?

ziyoda.quote: Millat Umidi provided me not only with a good job, but also created a strong environment for self-development and growth. The teaching process is integrated with modern technologies, which creates more opportunities for us and students.
ziyoda.name: Ziyoda Rakhmonova
ziyoda.title: English Teacher

ulugbek.quote: Every idea is valued in the organization. Working at Millat Umidi University is not just about salary, but about finding your mission. There is a real team spirit here.
ulugbek.name: Ulugbek Karimov
ulugbek.title: Computer Science Professor

jamshid.quote: Millat Umidi gave me the opportunity to work with a global approach in the field of science and education. Every project is a new experience. Every teacher is your companion on the path of growth.
jamshid.name: Jamshid Abdullayev
jamshid.title: Research Director

dilorom.quote: We take an individual approach to each candidate. Hiring processes are fast, clear and humane. Working in this company means being a team based on values.
dilorom.name: Dilorom Nazarova
dilorom.title: HR Manager

mohira.quote: I feel that I contribute directly to the growth of children every day. The positive environment and pedagogical approach at school inspires working with students.
mohira.name: Mohira Toshpulatova
mohira.title: Elementary School Teacher

shaxzod.quote: Millat Umidi is committed to developing every employee. Through trainings, mentoring system and continuous support, we create the foundation for teachers' achievements.
shaxzod.name: Shaxzod Rakhimov
shaxzod.title: Professional Development Coordinator

umidjon.quote: Millat Umidi is not just an educational organization, but the home of a team responsible for the future of generations. Each of our employees plays an important role in our common mission - developing quality education in Uzbekistan.
umidjon.name: Umidjon Ishmukhamedov
umidjon.title: Founder & CEO
